resume.opening: A highly motivated and seasoned full stack software engineer driven by innovation and craftsmanship. Building stuff and solving problems bring me joy. Constantly in search of knowledge and I learn best on the job.

experience.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description: Developed a real-time flight operation dashboard that empowers ground operation monitoring and decision making.
Developed a culinary recipe repository app that enables knowledge retention and transfer for chefs.
Proficient in designing and implementing cloud-native solutions using Azure, focusing on serverless computing for scalability and reliability.
Conducted code reviews, provided technical guidance, and mentored junior developers to promote best practices and maintain code quality.
Participated in Agile development processes, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Experienced in embedded OS development for eSE & eSIM product with smart card technology. e.g. Javacard, GlobalPlatform (GP), etc.
Improved applet package upgrade feature (GP Amendment H) that is critical for card content management.
Implemented NFC eUICC feature in enabling contactless applet management (GP Amendment C) on eSIM profiles.
Responsible for defining and writing unit and systematic tests for new Javacard 3.1 features for better robustness.
Acted as Asset Manager to manage inventory for chips and card samples and complied to security audit.
Skilled in using development tools: Git, Jira, Jenkins.

experience.title: IoT Engineer
description: Designed and developed wireless battery-powered sensor with Zigbee wireless technology (TI's CC2530/31 and ZStack).
Developed IoT applications using NodeJS on Linux-based gateway.
Designed PCB and plastic casings for battery-powered meter interface units that are compatible with partner's utility meters.
Performed various hands-on tasks and on-site installation to ensure customers' satisfaction.
Conducted product training on alarm monitoring system to enable customers to fulfill their application requirements.

education.title: Bachelor of Bioengineering
description: Medical Device Design: Prototyping of a medical device with basic programming, electronics assembly, and 3D printing.

projects.description: An app to scrape and run ExamTopics questions. Using Next.js and Vercel.

projects.description: A front-end capstone project using React.js.

projects.description: A word-linking game developed in React.js and Bootstrap.

projects.title: Blood Glucose Level App
projects.description: Android app for manual recording of blood sugar, insulin dosage, and meals.

projects.title: aes.c
projects.description: C implementation of AES cipher, includes AES-XTS 128-bit and 256-bit modes.

projects.description: Python script for analyzing message frequency and most used words from Telegram message history.

projects.title: Request Throttler
projects.description: A service to throttle user request to backend server based on request rate. An interview technical challenge from Cartrack.

certifications.title: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
